Nerangs.ab: pas barsom frōd ō māhrōy nihišn sar ī zōhr abar griftan ud zōhr bē nigerīdan aṣ̌əm vohū sē guftan
"He has to put the barsom on the māhrōy, take the top (of the saucer for) the zōhr and gaze at the zōhr.

čon panǧe-ye kuček va bozorg yazišn konand aṣ̌əm vohū sē guftan frauuarāne sauuaŋhə̄e raθβąm wāz gīrišnīh zōt yaθā ahū vairiiō zaōtā frā.mē mrūtē rāspīg yaθā ahū vairiiō zaōtā frā.mē mrūtē rāspīg yaθā ahū vairiiō yō zaōtā frā.mē mrūtē zōt aθā ratuš kardan tā frauuaṣ̌aiiō yaz yā̊ vīsāδa bun tā sar guftan pas barsom frōd ō ī barsomdān nihišn sar ī zōhr abar griftan zōhr bē nigerīdan aṣ̌əm vohū sē guftan

"When they peform a liturgy during the Five Lesser or Five Greater Days, they should say three aṣ̌əm vohū and the frauuarāne with sauuaŋhə̄e raθβąm and taking of the wāz: the zōt should recite yaθā ahū vairiiō zaōtā frā.mē mrūtē, the rāspīg yaθā ahū vairiiō zaōtā frā.mē mrūtē rāspīg yaθā ahū vairiiō yō zaōtā frā.mē mrūtē and the zōt should answer aθā ratuš. They recite the frauuaṣ̌aiiō yazamaide yā̊ vīsāδa from the beginning to the end. He has to put the barsom on the barsomdān, take the container of the zōhr and gaze at the zōhr. They should recite three aṣ̌əm vohū"
